uwcse.graphics
Class Input

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uwcse.graphics.Input
public class Input
extends java.lang.Object

A simple I/O class. Can read ints, doubles, strings, and chars. Attempts to robustly handle error inputs, by reprompting the user.
